document_data.name: Gloom
document_data.mainbody: '''''Gloom''''' was a rare [[spell]] that darkened an area.
document_data.Effects: When cast, all light sources within a {{SI|120|ft}} area dimmed significantly. The spell affected both magical and mundane light. This spell was often used to protect light-sensitive creatures such as [[vampire]]s from sunlight.
document_data.Casting: In addition to [[verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s, this spell required a [[material component]], special [[incense]] which was made by the caster.
document_data.History: This spell was known to be used by wizards of the [[Cult of the Dragon]].
